categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ferrin was a male Zabrak who worked as an agent in the employ of Imperial Intelligence during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. He was stationed aboard Vaiken Spacedock.

Agent Ferrin appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a PvE gear vendor for the Imperial Agent class on Vaiken Spacedock, though he was later removed in a reorganization of the gear system.
